hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # once a day on the 1st and 15th of every month except December H 3 * 1-12 *

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
## working OK cd /extra/other_files/WoRMS/ ls -lt rm -f WoRMS2EoL.zip
wget -nv http://www.marinespecies.org/export/eol/WoRMS2EoL.zip
#wget -c -nv http://www.marinespecies.org/export/eol/WoRMS2EoL.zip ## -nv means non-verbose but errors gets printed out. ## -c means continue. In cases where there is incomplete download.
ls -lt chmod 755 WoRMS2EoL.zip ls -lt
